magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

description.value:
À 3e niveau, vous choisissez le type de spécialiste que vous êtes. Votre choix vous accorde des caractéristiques au 5e niveau et à nouveau au 9e et 15e niveau.

Artificer Specialists

@Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-subclasses.rSeIM0k5zNGXnLnW]{Alchemist}

An Alchemist is an expert at combining reagents to produce mystical effects. Alchemists use their creations to give life and to leech it away.

@Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-subclasses.7gUGUAEsUPJ7mCni]{Armorer}

An artificer who specializes as an Armorer modifies armor to function almost like a second skin. The armor is enhanced to hone the artificer's magic, unleash potent attacks, and generate a formidable defense.

@Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-subclasses.Uu7hzTuHO62BF1el]{Artillerist}

An Artillerist specializes in using magic to hurl energy, projectiles, and explosions on a battlefield. This destructive power is valued by armies in the wars on many different worlds.

@Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-subclasses.3eeAOh8BDopBMrHc]{Battle Smith}

Armies require protection, and someone has to put things back together if defenses fail. A combination of protector and medic, a Battle Smith is an expert at defending others and repairing both materiel and personnel.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-subclasses.GraNLBHYVOhTEfI8]{Mastermaker}

A Mastermaker specializes in integrating flesh and steel, creating powerful construct limbs and replacing weak organs of flesh with components of metal and stone.
